item.title: Using Grails to power your Electric Car
item.description: Past week I really enjoyed visiting & speaking at the Grails Conference (GR8Conf 2013). The organisation made it possible that for me to host a talk about “Using Grails to power your Electric Car”. Using Grails to power your Electric Car
